attributes.action: INDUCT JAMES MACE AS A GLADIATOR ON SKY TV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is his destiny! Gladiators has not been revived for no reason!
Come on! He wouldn't even have to change his name!
"For the Gladiators: It's MACE!"
If more proof is needed, James Mace is not a carbon-based life form, he is based on the fifth element.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
